mapper.update: CREATE TABLE t_store_detail ( uuid INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, create_date DATETIME NOT NULL, create_user_id VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, update_date DATETIME NOT NULL, update_user_id VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, version INT NOT NULL, bw_branch_no VARCHAR(8), _index INT NOT NULL, item_barcode VARCHAR(16), item_name VARCHAR(128), item_sale_amt DECIMAL(19,2), item_subno VARCHAR(16), opt_date VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, opt_date_m VARCHAR(2), opt_date_y VARCHAR(4), org_id VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, stock_amt DECIMAL(19,2), stock_qty DECIMAL(19,2), store_flg VARCHAR(1), PRIMARY KEY (uuid), CONSTRAINT _index UNIQUE (_index, opt_date, org_id), INDEX item_barcode (item_barcode, org_id), INDEX index_store_detail_org_id_item_subno (item_subno, org_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
